title: Christopher Luxury Sedan Service Announces The Launch Of Maui Town Car Service
text:
Christopher Luxury Sedan Service Announces The Launch Of Maui Town Car Service 
Christopher Luxury Sedan Service LLC introduces limousine, town car service, tours on Maui, Uber Select alternative and Uber Select alternative within Maui, Wailea, Kapalua and Kahului OGG Airport. 
US , 19 October 2015 -- 
Christopher Luxury Sedan Service Announces The Launch Of Maui Town Car Service 
Lahaina, HI; Christopher Luxury Sedan Service, LLC; http://www.mauitowncar.com , Thanks everyone for the opportunity of introducing the company to the public. Christopher Luxury Sedan Service, LLC, is a specialty transport company dedicated to providing the best transportation service with experienced drivers and well cared for, late model vehicles. Services include tours on Maui, limo, town car service, Uber Select alternative and Uber Select alternative within Maui, Wailea, Kapalua and Kahului OGG Airport. About the company’s staff & commitment to safety Christopher Luxury Sedan Service takes safety more seriously than the common limo company. The BMW 7Li series seats four comfortably and was specially chosen for unparalleled safety-THE 7 Series is consistently named an Institute for Highway Safety top pick, ensuring your time on Maui will never be compromised. All of our drivers are professional and communicate perfectly in English. Janet G. an owner and shareholder, had this to say about Christopher Luxury Sedan Service: “Even though we are a limousine style transportation company, all of our drivers take our passenger’s personal safety very seriously; we will do everything we can to ensure your safety in or out of the car, our team’s seasoned judgment is your best friend when you are in our tours on Maui . All of our drivers know the Island as well as their own family and come with impeccable credentials. Rest comfortably while looking out our large windows from the long wheelbase sedans be it in quiet serenity or optimized with our specialized tour guide’s entertaining Maui fun-fact color commentary. We realize the last scenic drive to the Kahului OGG Airport is special, enjoy it from a luxurious setting. We have fun here on Maui, we hope you will join us!” About Christopher As a senior manager/partner in Christopher Luxury Sedan Service, Chris contributes to the company as a mechanical/operations supervisor, relief manager of operations and one of our personal security drivers. Recently honorably discharged as a SGT in the United States Marine Corp, Chris is currently pursuing his degree in business through his G.I. Bill. Chris is also a graduate of Lahainaluna high school and the son & grandson of one of Kaanapali’s first families. Chris spent many nights with his fellow Marines telling them of life on Maui and the natural beauty he enjoyed during Christmas at home, now a SGT in the Marine Corp Reserve, Chris is focusing on the remainder of his education preparing for the company’s explosive projected growth only a Marine could guide with dignity and honor. For more information, visit http://www.mauitowncar.com # # #
